conda install -c conda-forge pip

pip install "thinc>=8.0.0a0" ml_datasets "tqdm>=4.41"

conda install -c conda-forge jupytext jupyterlab ipywidgets


conda install -c conda-forge mypy

------------- pip install gluonnlp 

conda install -c pytorch pytorch

conda install -c conda-forge pytorch-pretrained-bert

////conda install -c conda-forge tensorflow=1.14.0 tensorflow-probability tensorboard

------- pip install tensorflow>2.0 
-------pip install tensorflow-probability 
-------pip install tensorboard

conda install -c conda-forge transformers

conda install -c conda-forge matplotlib seaborn plotly

conda install -c conda-forge python-language server

conda install ipykernel


#### Pip things
pip install gluonnlp 
pip install tensorflow>2.0 
pip install tensorflow-gpu

python -m ipykernel install --user --name pythinc_env
